description: Detects netsh commands that configure a port forwarding (PortProxy) Author: Florian Roth, omkar72, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: WSL2 network bridge PowerShell script used for WSL/Kubernetes/Docker (e.g. https://github.com/microsoft/WSL/issues/4150#issuecomment-504209723)
name: Netsh Port Forwarding
query: (process.executable:*\\netsh.exe AND ((process.command_line:*interface* AND process.command_line:*portproxy* AND process.command_line:*add* AND process.command_line:*v4tov4*) OR (process.command_line:*connectp* AND process.command_line:*listena* AND process.command_line:*c\=*)))
